> [nowotny](#comment_2_13CzgwZUSqr5FsFwgwjes7i6JY1TskoTbw): I've removed it and restarted ZeroNet, and it of course made a new users.json file. But on 08chan, for example, old posts I made are still recognized as mine "(You)", it shouldn't be doing this, should it?
